dialogues.text: I'd like to buy a vowel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bearded lady yawns. Rick edges towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. The Wheel. Mind if I sit in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan advances towards Rick, sneering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So. Now you don't mind mixing with us--how did you say it--sorry mutants?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! I'm sorry for what happened at the show. Can't you just forget it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes his finger at Juan, and notices there's still a human nose stuck on his monster claw. He wipes it off, embarrassed. There's an awkward pause. Ernie breaks the silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, shouldn't you tell Rick about your big escape plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan gives Ernie a nasty "shut up" look. He growls at him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, excuse me for living.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have an escape plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Beast Boy, the games are a simple diversion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beneath our twisted flesh we freaks cry out for freedom! Aooooooorrraaaagh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan howls lustily. He looks to rest of the freaks. They' a pathetic lot, and their half-hearted howl proves it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aoo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan's plan is really ingenious Rick. See, he figured out that--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured out that our escape does not include the Beast Boy. No one may discuss the plan with him, understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan gives the others a threatening look. They mumble agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter with all of you? You trust your lives to a guy just 'cause he can lick his own privates?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks ponder this a second, then nod "yes".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta admit, Coog, it's a helluva trick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine! I'll just come up with an escape plan of my own then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha! I have spent a year studying this hellhole, devising the perfect escape. You think you'll just tango right out the door!? Ha! Just try it, amigo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick turns to go. JulieErnie rush over and try to reason with him quietly. 52.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick, wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Don't go off half-cocked. Believe me, it ain't all it's cracked up to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't one of your dumb movies, Coogan. Look, Juan's a good dog, a smart dog. I'll talk to him. Don't be stupid, Rick. You can't do it without us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it! I don't need you, EES, or anybody else! I'll get out of here all by myself, you... you.,. crud sucking pus monkeys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DING DING DING! The letters in the Wheel of Fortune board light up, and ROSIE turns them over to reveal "Crud Sucki Pus Monkeys" as the secret phrase. Everyone claps despite themselves. Juan stares them down. They stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick storms off in a huff. Juan takes Julie's hand and ga deep into her eyes. He kisses her passionately. Julie is watching Rick leave. Juan nibbles her neck, which gets he attention. She scratches Juan behind his ear. His leg instinctively kicks the air. Ernie looks worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting a bad feeling here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of sight from the others, Rick approaches the rear do and tries it. It doesn't open from the inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He peers out through a crack in the door and sees a MILKM getting out of his truck in the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Psst! Hey, you. Milkman! 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The milkman looks over at the outhouse, suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... ?

dialogues.speaker: RICK, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Just the man I'm lookinq for. Be a pal, and give me a hand will ya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh no! I know you freaks. You'll try anything just to get someone to open that door. Well not me! Ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's about to walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Guess I'll just have to milk the world's biggest breasted woman all by myself. Sorry to bother you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The milkman stops in his tracks. He tiptoes over to the b door of the outhouse, listening intently as Rick goes int his "act."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a lusty womanish

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooohh... Milk me! Milk me now! Milk me hard! (Normal Rick voice) I've only got two hands, all right? Geez. I don't care if Elijah did give you skim milk on the right side, chocolate on the left, and eggnog in the middle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The milkman is salivating at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gee, I love eggnog!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The milkman opens the door eagerly and steps inside. Beat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, what the--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BONK. We hear the sound of bottled buttermilk beaning his soft noggin. Rick walks out wearing the milkman outfit complete with the little six-milk-bottle-carrier thing. 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks around and heads for the milk truck, whistling casually. He notices something. It's ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Its big eyes are staring at Rick (note: there's a skywrit plane in the distance behind the head, which finishes wri "YOU GOT THE RIGHT ONE BABY: PEPSI") Rick gets to the tru and tries the door. It's locked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over at the giant head. The eyes are still stari at him--they seem to have shifted. Rick shrugs it off and looks around. He walks over to Elijah's car. It's locked too. He checks the big eyes. They've moved again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick's getting a bit desperate. He sees something else an runs towards it. It's a dry-docked motorboat. It's locked too. The eyes have followed Rick again. He sees something else and runs over to it. It's a bag of golf clubs leanin against Elijah's porch. They're locked too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn! This guy doesn't trust anybody!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the giant head- the eyes are gone, leaving on empty eyesockets! Rick hears A BURST OF MACHINEGUN FIRE behind him, spins around and faces ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: with little arms and legs, wearing Jamaican Rasta hats an aiming smoking Uzi 9mms in the air. They aim their Uzis a Rick. One holds a walkie-talkie, the other holds a big spliff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A T.V. MONITOR in Elijah's hands, shows Rick staring at u the Eye's POV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: seen in extreme close-up, watches the surveillance monito He speaks into a microphone. We don't see what the room looks like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work, Eye and Eye. 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: bob in response to Elijah. They have no mouths, but their pupils open and close when they speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rastafari.

dialogues.speaker: ELIJAH, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: (over the walkie-talkie) Now bring the Beast Boy to my, uh, den. Ha-ha-ha-ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick looks worried as they lead him towards the scary loo house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a lovely, suburban den with a coffee table full of magazines like "Better Homes and Gardens," "National Revi and "Freaks Illustrated". Elijah sits in a big Barcaloung smoking a pipe. Rick sits on the sofa. Toad walks up with tray of soft drinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diet soda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah points to a bowl of Fiddle Faddle. Toad sits besid Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fiddle Faddle? (Rick shakes his head) You sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, okay. (he scoops some into his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, are you gonna torture me or kill me or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torture my greatest creation ever!? Kill the final piece of the puzzle that I've been putting together for years!? Sure, it'd be fun, but I've got a bigger plan, my boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And when you ripped off that guy's head, I knew it was working like gangbusters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I thought I scared everyone away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-huh. And then they told two friends, and they told two friends, and so on, and so on. Look at this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah grabs a big mail bag and spills some letters out o the table. Elijah opens one and reads it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dear Mister Skuggs, I was shocked and disgusted when my grandson told me about the head-popping beast at your show. Please send me six tickets. (he reads another) Dear Beast Boy, I used to like New Kids on The Block, but you're way cuter. My favorite ice cream is chocolate. Is it fun ripping people's heads off? I love you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Beast Boy is on a blood-letting spree, and Oscar is along for the ride! (he looks up at Rick) That one's from Pat Collins!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but she loves everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick reaches for the Fiddle Faddle but the bowl is empty. Toad BURPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toad! That Fiddle Faddle is for guests only! You've had enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toad is blankfaced. Elijah walks over and refills the bow Rick scoops some into his mouth. Elijah walks to the fireplace and pushes the embers around with a poker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look Skuggs--Elijah--I've been in show business all my life. The public does not want to see disgusting, depraved violent filth. 57.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and I suppose Jake and the Fatman is just a fluke?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone rings. Elijah looks at it, and back to Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes over to the phone and lifts the receiver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Yello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the other end of the line, we hear LAUGHING MAN's insa chuckle. Elijah's smooth smile fades. He turns his back t Rick, who strains to identify the familiar laughing voice Elijah scribbles notes on a pad by the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... Right... Tomorrow... Mmhmm... Mnunhmm... Wow. Okay. You got it... Hasta la vista to you too. Hahaahahaahaha--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laughing Man hangs up on Elijah. He looks a little pissed off as he turns to face Rick again. Grumbling, he takes t poker in hand, and pokes at the coals angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Coogan. I'm finished with you for now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ricky rises and snatches the notepad just before Elijah s to face him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But listen. I may not be "Mr. Tinseltown", but I damn well know what I like. You're gonna be a hideous killing machine, and that's final! Tomorrow night I'll finish the job onstage! And then, to demonstrate your horrible power, you'll slaughter all the old obsolete freaks in cold bl--HEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah thrusts the red hot fire poker out and ZAP! He catches Toad's ten foot tongue--curled around the searing poker inches from the Fiddle Faddle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah shows Rick out the door. The Eyes scurry out and l back into the sockets in the giant head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bye-bye. And remember, try another escape, and I'll feed your balls to Toad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he walks towards the Freak House, Rick pulls out the n he pocketed. A gust of wind blows it away from him. He chases it behind the carnival tent where...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KKCCLIINNK! He runs into ELEVEN PHONY MILKMEN, backing th way around the corner, each carrying their own six-pack o milkbottles. Startled, they turn around. Why, it's the freaks! And they're all dressed as milkmen! Cowboy carrie the hammer, who's dressed in a little milkman suit as wel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Rick, I thought you were gonna come up with your own escape plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your big plan? A dozen milkmen? Isn't that a little unusual?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan hadn't thought of this. He pushes himself forward an confronts Rick viciously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve milkmen is theoretically possible. Thirteen is silly. Looks like one milkman too many, Coogan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes Rick aside. The freaks continue past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine then. Go ahead. Hope you like reggae, ya flea bitten bastard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick watches as the Freaks approach the open courtyard, w he knows the Eyeballs will spot them. 59.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie glances at him a second, then looks away. His mind made up, Rick takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs over to the Freaks. He stands in Juan's way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, you'll all be killed. You don't know about Elijah's giant Rasta eyeballs with machine guns... (they think he's nuts) It's suicide! I can't let you do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I can't let you stop us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it. Rick and Juan square off. Juan growls and bar his teeth. Rick's MONSTER EYE starts to glow and pulse dimly. They circle each other. The others are transfixed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He peers through a side window, and sees the pack of milk cheering two of their coworkers, locked in mortal combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a lot of milkmen on the same route. No wonder they fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juan rears back, about to lunge, when suddenly he freezes looks off into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is sitting innocently a few yards off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Squirrel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He zooms off after the squirrel. The Eyes pop out of the giant head and follow after him, Uzis FIRING. Juan dodges their bullets and disappears after his prey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks watch their best chance of freedom run off aft pesky rodent. They turn to Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, giant Rasta eyeballs, just like Rick said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gosh, if it wasn't for Rick, we'd all be dead! 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Way to go Rick! Alright!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, I can't believe he left you for a squirrel. What a dick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie's hurt. She doesn't even smack Ernie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know how men are. Besides, it was a pretty good looking squirrel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie looks at Rick. She sees he's trying to be helpful, sarcastic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the others) Come on. You heard the Beast Boy. Back to the Freak House, now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her eyes meet Rick's. She manages a smile, and Rick smile back. Ernie sizes up the situation and groans as they all head back to the Freak House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh well, at least we'll get to try a new position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're moving in towards a door in this desolate, vaguely corporate looking hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking at the back of Laughing Man's leather chair We hear his CACKLE, as well as STUEY GLUCK'S TORTURED SCR and a horrible POWER TOOL NOISE. We can see the usual bri interrogation spotlight, and a couple of extra GOONS watc the goings on, but Stuey and his actual torturer are hidd by Laughing Man's chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move past Mr. Big's chair to reveal Stuey lying face d on a table, while Bob Vila is using a power sander on his butt. Bob is happily giving pointers to the two goons. 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Notice the way I use an elliptical motion to chafe Stuey's buttocks. (the Goons nod

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all here in my new book: Pipes, Fixtures, and Torturing

dialogues.speaker: LAUGHING MAN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (Loud, sharp laugh)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bob obediently shuts up. Laughing Man directs a sinister chuckle to Stuey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way. I'll never talk! I'm made of stone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bob considers this a second, then starts up a jackhammer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear LONESOME HARMONICA MUSIC as we pan past the cubic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cowboy is playing the harmonica... The Bearded Lady untie the pretty pink ribbon in his hair and sets it aside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, we switch to HORRIFIC PSYCHO STINGS as the came picks up PAUL LYNDE'S CORPSE with flashing red lights. Hi eyeball drips out of the socket again...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it's back to the SAD HARMONICA MUSIC. In the next cubicle, Ernie is sleeping, Julie is awake, dreamily fond a large eclair. She looks longingly up towards Rick's cubicle as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick (his face is normal) and Julie kiss passionately in billowy white bed amidst puffy clouds. 62.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie, compared to this, sex with Julia Roberts was a thankless chore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow her gaze, panning up to Rick. He's lying on his bed, dreamily fondling a donut. He looks down towards Julie's cabin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Julie kiss passionately. We're tight on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Rick, you've touched a place in me no one has ever touched before.

dialogues.speaker: ERNIE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I'll say! Almost punctured a kidney!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDEN to show Ernie, still attached to Julie, leering at Rick. Rick is mortified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick sits in his cubicle, visibly sickened by his daydrea Stuey's echoey voice drifts in.

dialogues.speaker: STUEY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Rick! Riiiicccck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A holographic image of Stuey lying on the torture table appears over Rick. We can see the jackhammer looming over Stuey's face. Rick looks alarmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! Do something! It's up to you, Rick! Pleeeeeeease!

dialogues.speaker: LAUGHING MAN, (O.S)
dialogues.text: Aha-hee-hee-ho-ho-har-har-har! 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Laughing Man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick watches the hologram break up and disappear. Wheels spinning in his head, he takes the crumpled piece of pape out of his pocket and reads it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Holy shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie and Ernie are struggling over a bottle of deodorant

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It says it's strong enough for a man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's made for a woman!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs it away and shoves it in Ernie's mouth. Rick wa in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Rick. What's up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Read this. I grabbed it from Skuggs' office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands her the notepaper. She reads it, with some difficulty. Ernie is still gagging on deodorant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Tape Donahue... Renew Subscription to Beaver World..." Eeuw!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gives Rick a disgusted look. Ernie mumbles with the deodorant in his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interested, muffled) Beaver World!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie smacks him--he swallows the deodorant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After that. 64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Prepare demonstration for Laughing Man, receive five thousand barrels of Noxon." Five thousand barrels!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah's up to something big, and we have to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie BELCHES. Rick sniffs the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmmm. Jasmine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick takes a deep breath, and begins his presentation to freaks assembled before him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright guys, listen up--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sockhead suddenly freaks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're done for! We're done for! I don't want to die! It's the end of the world! The apocalypse! Aahh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops. Everyone is staring at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I haven't said anything yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. I'm not much for timing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes his seat again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tomorrow night, at the show, I'll be turned into a homicidal monster and forced to kill you all. But we might have a chance if we act fast. And I'm prepared to be your new leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sockhead nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I've got a plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I still say we kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sockhead nods again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can get into Elijah's lab, maybe we can--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course! Design a super freak of our own and manipulate the genetic code to make him destroy Elijah instead of us! Brilliant!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Well--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how do we get to the lab?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, maybe--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right! The worm could dig a tunnel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By God, it's so crazy it might just work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you need Noxon 24 to make the freaking sludge, and Elijah told us himself he's run out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Oh yeah. Well, see, what I was going to say was-- 66.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Exactly! If they've been using Noxon 24 as a fertilizer here, the entire ecosystem must be soaked with it! All we need is a way to extract it from the vegetation, ideally into a liquid form.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right. Well, what about--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Golly! So that's why my milk comes out that funny green color! I thought the grass tasted funny! Wow, Rick, you're a genius!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good thinking, Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks all nod in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way to go, Rick! How did you ever think of such a plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick pulls out an old comic book and points to an ad for Monkeys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, actually, I was going to suggest we send away for sea monkeys, train them to fire guns, and make a break for it. But if you want to go with this other thing, I guess that's okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks stare at him, not sure if he's kidding or not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Nosey milks Cowboy, squirting the glowing milk into a fu which feeds into a crude still. The Torch heats the boile

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -The Worm digs the tunnel. JulieErnie hand Rick pieces of wood which he puts into place as tunnel supports. They ha him Paul Lynde's corpse and he wedges it in as well. 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Everyone's getting into it and working up a sweat. Nosey wipes his brow, opens a bottle of Pepsi and chugs it down a beautifully lit slo-mo product shot... The other freaks follow suit, including the Worm, down in the tunnel, who struggles to hold the bottle in his tiny feeler.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything's going great and the song is really pumping when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: runs out on his front porch in his nightclothes and screa down at the outhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nosey turns off a boom box and the music cuts short. The freaks exchange tense looks. Nosey calls out apologetical to Elijah.

dialogues.speaker: SOR-RY.
dialogues.text: (to the freaks) What a jerk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Worm burrows along, leaving a tunnel wide enough for and JulieErnie to crawl after him. Rick notices a ray of light coming through a rock formation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, look at this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all stop and look. Rick fingers the hole, and the ro cave in, revealing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's obviously a matte painting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good Lord! It's the Lost City of Nodd!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KER-CHUNK! We hear the sound of a slide projector switchi slides and the underground city is replaced by a still im of some tourists standing around a geyser. [foriegn versi the Blarney Stone].

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Old Faithful! (foriegn take: "It's the Blarney Stone!"]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They "Ooh" and "Ahh". The image switches to a snapshot of FAT MIDDLE-AGED WOMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my Aunt Gladys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other freaks nod politely. The image switches to a BA MITZVAH PHOTO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's me at my bar mitzvah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon Ernie, let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, you gotta see the ones from sleep-away camp! They're hilarious!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie smacks him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stooge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an "Antfarm View" of the yard, where the freaks are visible tunneling underground, and Toad is visible on the yard above them. We see a bat fly overhead... ZAP! Toad shoots out his tongue, snags it out of mid air, and chews happily, oblivious to the freaks burrowing right undernea him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nosey looks at the nearly full container of distilled Nox

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there. (he sniffs the air) But wait, I'm getting a whiff of things to come! 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you smell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bearded Lady looks grave..Nosey sniffs again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And hot buttered popcorn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awwright!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're burrowing along. Ernie loudly clears his throat. Julie spits out a loogie. She grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate when you do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear muffled BARKING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Do you hear that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a dog!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Worm breaks through into a small cavern with several exposed sewer pipes. A lovable mutt leaps out of a pipe a drops an old tennis ball in front of Rick. He starts lick Rick's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrappy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SAPPY MUSIC wells up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been ten years since you chased this ball into the sewer! I thought you were gone for good!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yap! 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen Scrap. Go home. Get help. Understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good boy! Now go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrappy runs away into the sewer pipe. Rick shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie taps on some exposed wood on the cavern ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, a wood floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It must be the lab! we've done it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look at each other excitedly. Suddenly Elijah's voice rings out behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so fast, you scabrous freaks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They spin around and see Nosey holding the bottle of Noxo 24. He grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't know I did impressions, did ya?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks are waiting around the hole. Nosey pops out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mission accomplished. They've got the Noxon, and they'll be in the lab within minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, this is going like clockwork!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone smiles, pats each other on the back, etc. Except Sockhead, who finally snaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Can't you see we're digging our own graves!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nuts, SOCKHEAD(cont'd) that's what it is! Nuts! Well, maybe you've all got a deathwish, but you can count me out! I'M GETTING THE HELL OUT OF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs amok, pushes various freaks to the ground, and ru around screaming. The freak house door opens--Eye and Eye step in to check out the noise. One of them has a spliff sticking out of its pupil. Sockhead charges at them like mad dog. They aim their Uzis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (at the Eyes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RATTA-RATTA-RATTA! They spray an ungodly amount of bullet into Sockhead. He falls to the ground. The Eyes leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks gather around Sockhead. Nosey pulls the sock o his hand head, which is making a little "Senor Pepe" face with its fist. It spits up a trickle of blood and tries t speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I... just... wanna...say...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it, kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, forget it. I'm not much for dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes limp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JulieErnie, the Worm, and Rick are just emerging from the hole. It's really dark in the lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit. I can't see a damn thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your voice down, Ernie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't push me, Coog. I got a real short fuse today. I'm cranky, bloated, got a wicked case of cramps. Don't ask why. 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers to Rick) PMS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (has to think about this) Oh.... Right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick pats Ernie on the shoulder reassuringly. He moves ov to Elijah's computer terminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, here it is--the control panel for Elijah's Freaking process.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work, my boy. Now step aside. This is scientist's work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Worm muscles Rick out of the way and sits at the console. Using a pen held in his mouth, he flicks a series of swit and punches a fast series of computer keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light on top of the Tasty Freekz machine starts to revolve, and after a couple of seconds, a stream of GOOEY LIGHT BROWN GLOP oozes out of the spigot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! It's working!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it, Worm! Way to go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how? You didn't even use the Noxon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Worm rushes over to the container of glop below the spigot, and without hesitation, plunges his face into it! Rick, Julie, and Ernie gasp in horror!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WORM lifts his glop-smeared face out of the bowl, and smacks his lips in delight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah! You don't need Noxon to make Butterscotch pudding. I just wanted to test the machine's capabilities. Mmmm! Glorious! So creamy! Yum!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Worm is lost in his pudding-induced reverie. They ign him. Julie turns to Rick. 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, Rick. Do you really think we should put this toxic glop on you? What if it doesn't work? What if something goes wrong? What

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it does work, do you think there'll be enough left over to give me a monster size rodney?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie goes to doink Ernie in the eyes, but he uses the classic "Three Stooges" handblock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, hold this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick hands the container of Noxon to Ernie. Julie gives h the eyepoke. Rick shakes hands with Julie, and takes back the Noxon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. (to Julie, heroically) Look, I've been a freak all my life.' I realize that now. Up there on that screen, humiliating myself for every fool with six bucks in his pocket--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seven bucks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes seven fifty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. It doesn't matter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure it does. They don't let you into the theater if you don't pay the price of the ticket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'm talking about the ultimate human sacrifice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No kidding. When you consider money for parking, popcorn, drinks... 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The worm chimes in, still gorging himself on pudding...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget a sitter for the children!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick's had enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! In case you haven't noticed, I'm about to commit a noble and selfless act here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick pounds the table, sending a glass beaker flying. It smashes through the window, setting off a loud SIREN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah's in his robe, watching the opening of "Crooked Co on TV. On screen is a revolving police beacon on a beat-u car, with a loud SIREN. Elijah munches his popcorn happil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie manages to silence the alarm by yanking the cord ou its socket. She shoots Rick a hard look, he shrugs innocently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Let's do what we came to do, and this time, no more screw ups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick slams his hand down for emphasis and impales it on o of those desktop paper pins. He SCREAMS in agony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah's watching an old war movie--a soldier is running across a battlefield with a bayonet, SCREAMING. He doesn' hear Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie has her hand over Rick's mouth, silencing his screa He calms down. He gingerly slides the pin out of his hand grimacing but not making a sound. He sighs with relief. T coast seems clear. Then, in SLOW MOTION, his hand knocks styrofoam cup off the desk and onto the ground. 75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The war movie has erupted into a massive battle--machine blaring, grenade launchers and bazookas booming, the work Suddenly, his ears perk up, and his head swivels around towards the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Styrofoam cup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He puts on his "smiley face" robe and bunny slippers and heads out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie is pouring the distilled Noxon into the top of the Tasty Freekz machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you think we should make some more pudding first, as a test?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Here goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He presses some buttons on the computer, and the Tasty Fr machine starts humming. Ernie is looking out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody's comin'! Hurry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to wait. There's no way to speed up the machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah comes out of the house and walks towards the lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick's starting to sweat. He looks over at Julie, who hol an empty Pepsi cup under the Tasty Freekz spigot. A drop ointment drips out and into the container.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here it comes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: begins to turn slowly. 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody freezes. The flow of ooze slows to a stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's plugged up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look over at the doorknob--it's still turning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it's your damn pudding, I'll ring your wormy neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Preposterous... I have no neck. I'm a worm, imbecile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: is still turning, agonizingly slowly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah is trying to turn the knob,, His grip keeps slippi because of the butter on his fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaargh! Damn buttered popcorn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spigot has started to discharge more,reliably. The Pe cup is filling up now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah is wiping his hands off on his shirt tails. He tri the door knob again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a low rumbling and the floor starts to shake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tunnel walls are about to collapse!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go ahead. I'll catch up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door knob is turning more vigorously, but still not opening. Julie and Ernie get in the hole with Worm, while Rick attends to the almost-full Pepsi cup of sludge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah is still having trouble with his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick pops the plastic lid onto the Pepsi cup, and climbs the hole. He rests the cup on the floor and lifts the flo board over his head. The RUMBLING gets louder as the tunn walls start to crumble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick is losing his balance as the ground shifts beneath h He sways, and knocks the Pepsi cup of sludge rolling. He watches, helpless, as it rolls across the floor and comes a stop across the room. For a second, he contemplates mak a dash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah has wrapped his shirt tails around the knob, and finally has a good grip. He twists the knob...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick sees the door opening. He dives down into the hole. The floor board falls into place just as Elijah walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah scans the room. He goes over towards the Tasty Fre machine and finds the styrofoam cup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad for the environment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He crumples it in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "antfarm view" again. We see the freaks running back through the tunnel as it caves in behind them. Toad sits the ground above, oblivious to them. We hear a low flying aircraft... ZAP! Toad shoots his tongue up out of frame a sucks the twin engine Cessna into his mouth. Beat. He BUR and spits up a propeller. 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks wait by the mouth of the tunnel. We hear the rumble approach. The worm, JulieErnie, and finally Rick scramble out of the opening. The dirt avalanche is stoppe short by Paul Lynde's corpse, just as Rick scrambles to safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just made it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paul saved our lives!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Way to go, Paul!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nosey claps Paul on what's left of his back--his skeleton shatters and the tunnel collapses, burying him instantly. The freaks are horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: turns to them guiltily in SLOW-MOTION. His voice is slowe down and distorted like John Lennon at the end of "Strawb

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... buried... Paul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to normal speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is no time to lament over a cadaver! We've got to get moving, or we're history! Now c'mon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nosey is still morose. He speaks backwards and sounds a l like "Revolution #9".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Daed si luap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUBTITLE: "Paul is dead."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said enough! Okay, listen up, everybody. We cracked the code and made the ointment we need to bring Skuggs down for good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks applaud and cheer. 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we left it in the lab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks jeer and pelt Rick with rotten vegetables. He desperately pulls a bag of cookies out of his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But wait! I found some macaroons! And there's plenty for all of us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks burst into applause again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yaayyy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Freaks are all sleeping, macaroon crumbs still left o their faces. There's a lot of snoring. Rick awakens with start. He hears something in the distance. Something like helicopter... He gets up and peeks out a crack in the wal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An EES corporate helicopter touches down. A few gun-totin SECURITY GUYS in dark suits and dark glasses get out. The check that the coast is clear, then give the signal. Out steps Richard Hertz. He mutters something to one of the security guys, and walks towards the Freak House.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) I don't believe it. What's Hertz doin' here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door to the Freak House opens. Hertz enters, unzips h fly. Finding no toilet, he shrugs and relieves himself on the floor. Rick steps out of the shadows towards him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So EES is in bed with Elijah C. Skuggs, eh? Figures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hertz is momentarily startled by Rick. He collects himsel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! Thank God I got to you in time! 80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut the crap, Hertz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hertz relieves himself as he talks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ricky, you have no idea how your misfortune has touched our hearts. When you disappeared we almost gave up hope. But we'd heard reports of Skuggs's reckless abuse of Noxon, and when the story broke in the tabloids, I decided to personally come down and get to the bottom of things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He zips up and heads to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cackle is unmistakable--Rick's face twists in horror he realizes... Hertz is THE LAUGHING MAN! Hertz ducks out the door. Rick looks after him, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a nearby SNORE cut off, and the Human Torch stand from the spot where Hertz relieved himself. He's dripping wet and no longer on fire. He sniffs his soaked, smolderi clothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peuw! Hey! Of all the... That really pisses me off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POOF! He catches fire again and walks off. Rick is doing slow burn, still looking after Hertz. He erupts and his monster eye glows briefly. He screams in anguish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dejected, Rick leans against the wall. JulieErnie walk up behind him. Julie puts a hand on Rick's shoulder to comfo him. As they look into each other's eyes, a loud CRASH distracts them. Rick peers through the crack. 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A caravan of EES trucks crash through the front gate and drive up to the lab. There's a few cargo trucks and a hug NOXON-24 tanker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A forklift drives out of the back of one of the large tru carrying the old corporate farts on a wooden palette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of them falls off, and a bunch of WORKMEN scramble ou prop him up and push him back into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah switches on the lights, and turns to face his audience. Hertz is accompanied by his stone-faced securit men and various executives. Workmen are busy installing t old board of directors and their arm-raising pulley syste

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice to see you in the flesh, Laughing Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need to use codenames, Elijah. We're all friends here. And just to prove it, I brought you a little present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hertz snaps his fingers and nods to a security guy, who produces a wriggling canvas sack. He dumps its contents o the lab table--it's Stuey Gluck! His glasses come tumblin out after him. He squints at the security guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick? Is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the troll?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was asking questions about Coogan, causing trouble. We figured he was one of yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey puts on his glasses. Elijah looks him up and down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I make freaks alright, but come on, fellas--this thing's pathetic. 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well you're no Julio Iglesias yourself, mister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! Riiiick! Riii--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick hears Stuey's voice in his head, all echoey.

dialogues.speaker: STUEY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: --iiiiiick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no, not now, Stuey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ghostly image of STUEY gradually takes shape in front Rick. Rick can make out the lab table Stuey's on, and som shadowy figures in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. That's Elijah's lab!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey! Are you really in the lab?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey is still wailing, and everybody else is getting pre damn annoyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! I'm in the lab! I'm in the lab!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not only ugly, he's crazy too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toad grabs Stuey and slaps a piece of tape over his mouth He throws him into one of the chicken cages along the far wall. A two-headed chicken starts to peck at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, where were we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, I'm not going to bullshit you. I know my setup here at Freakland looks like small potatoes. 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls the cover off a small scale model of Freakland, about ten inches high. It shows the stage, lab, outhouse, the head, everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But thanks to your Noxon and my genius, tonight I will turn Ricky Coogan into a freak so hideous, it'll be enough to turn your stomach inside out, boil your brain in its own juice, and cause cold sores you thought had healed up to start buggin' you again. (the EES men shift

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the dawning of a new age for us all. Behold, Super Mega Freak World!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whisks the cover off another scale model--it's exactly same as the little model except it's a lot bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's really somethin', huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very impressive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll kick Disney's dead ass!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick is watching all of this in a ghostly image.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey! Stuey, can you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey's image, still with his mouth taped shut and the chicken pecking at him, nods yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm hmmm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you to try and escape. Get the cup from underneath the instrument table and bring it to me, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmmm mmmmm! 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives Rick the old trademark Coogan thumbs up. Rick halfheartedly returns the gesture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, right. Get movin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey checks to make sure nobody's watching him. They're not. He removes the spring from a pocket pen and picks th lock. Stuey searches the floor, and spots the Pepsi cup. He'll have to crawl through several pairs of legs to reac it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At EES, our plans for your Gene Machine include everything, except shoes that is. Ha-ha-ha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha-ha. Gee, I'd love to see your plans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd love to show you. (to his assistant) Bill, if you'd be so kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BILL BLAZER, a slick and dashing EES marketing executive, strides confidently up to the podium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey has to duck the fast approaching legs. Bill steps o him, not even noticing he's there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill takes Elijah's "Freak World" graphic off an easel, a replaces it with his own. Finding no place to deposit Elijah's, he simply drops it on the floor. Elijah looks a little hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does today's businessman want? How about a receptionist with six arms, five mouths, and a knockout figure? That'd sure speed things up, wouldn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a big smile, Bill reveals an illustration of a multi limb secretary (in a sexy dress) talking on three differe phones, taking notes, and typing, all at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey heads towards the Pepsi cup. He brushes against the back of Hertz's legs. Hertz looks over at Elijah beside h who smiles politely. Hertz smiles back, invitingly. Maybe there's a few things we don't know about him. 85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the factory, how 'bout a worker with twelve busy hands, no mouth to talk back, and no genitalia or digestive system to distract him from his work?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure! It's what we all dream of!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EES guys all nod along. Except for the workmen, who exchange worried looks. Elijah's still not sure what to m of it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Stuey has the Pepsi cup of sludge in hand, and he's crawling under the table towards the door. He brushe up against the back of Elijah's legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah looks over to Hertz, who gives him that smile agai Elijah looks away quickly, panicky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, with this Skuggs-based Noxon technology, it's not only possible, it's just the beginning! Of course, what happened to our expensive spokesman Ricky Coogan was an unfortunate coincidence, but profits from these new markets could total in the billions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the executives turn to Hertz. He cracks a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ricky who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The executives laugh heartily. Stuey glances across the r to the door. He has to make a break for it, so he does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey freezes. He's right out in the open, in plain view. Still, nobody seems to see him. They're still watching- Bill's presentation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secretaries? Worker drones? Where's the fun? Where's the spark? Where's the unspeakable evil?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill laughs pleasantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha-ha. I was just getting to that. 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bill launches back into his speech with more intensity th even the best infomercials. Meanwhile, Stuey inches towar the door, moving as imperceptibly as possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll impact every field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: creams, nosejobs in a bottle. Military--human death machines that make Schwarzenegger look like a pansy! And why stop at consumer products? Hell, we can design a whole new consumer! A few well placed drops in the water supply, and bingo! It's a new master race, and we own the copyright! An entire planet of freaks owned and operated by us! Every part of their bodies comes from an EES supplier, every thought they think is EES policy! From now on gentlemen, it's EES uber alles! EES uber alles!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EES guys clap and shout approval. Elijah's impressed too. He leans over to Hertz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy's good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lured him away from A.T.&T.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey is finally out the door. Of course, now they spot h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! The troll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After him!

dialogues.text: Stuey is outside the lab. Inexplicably, (actually it's ju because he's so stupid) he's still moving inch by inch. H calls to Rick through the tape on his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm! Mmmmm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick sees the image of Stuey inching away from the lab. 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the tape off your mouth, idiot! They didn't tie your hands!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey realizes this is true, and pulls the tape off his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got the cup, Rick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great! There's no time to waste. Are you being followed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. But if I don't move, they won't see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two big EES security guys are standing watching Stuey's o behavior. They pick him up and carry him away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Riiiick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick sees this all in his holographic image. It fades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a geek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to the other freaks, who've woken up and are gathered around on the floor. Rick shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey got caught. There's no way to get the ointment before the show.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, that's it then? We're all to die... And by your hand no less.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It won't be me. It's some inhuman monster Elijah used me to create. As for me, the real me, I'll always be your friend. Before I have to rip your heads off, I'd like to say goodbye to each of you. (He turns to Worm.) Worm... I'll miss your brains, the smell of your pipe, and the funny way you always go on talking until everyone wants to strangle you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pats the Worm on the head tenderly, and turns to Cowbo 88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cowboy, I'll miss your good humor, your down-home wisdom, and of course, the frothy milkshakes were udderly delicious, heh-heh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He smiles and playfully tugs Cowboy's udder. He turns to Bearded Lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bearded... Lady... I dunno. We'll always have Paris...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bearded lady is kind of confused, Rick shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nosey, I never really liked you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves on to Frog Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frog Man, I think death is probably the best thing for you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frog Man nods in agreement. Rick rpaches JulieErnie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie... Julie... I have mixed feelings. (He turns to Ernie) On one hand, I'll remember you as the best friend a jerk like me ever had, and a low down repulsive slimeball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Julie. ROMANTIC MUSIC swells up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the other hand, I really respect you, and more than that, I, uh, well, I wish we'd had the chance to boink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Rick...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They embrace. Rick calls out to the assembled group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today I make the proudest boast a man can utter: "Ich bien ein Freak!" 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all ready to cheer, but they're confused by his b German. Rick has to explain himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, I'm a freak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. They all get it. Beat. Then they cheer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge banner reads "NEW IMPROVED BEAST BOY SLAUGHTERS HI

dialogues.speaker: LOVED ONES
dialogues.text: ONLY!". We can hear the sound of the crowd inside.

dialogues.text: There's a typically smallish crowd in addition to the EES executives who occupy the front seats. The security goons are strategically situated throughout the tent, and two o them sit on either side of Stuey in the second row. Elija is onstage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now the moment you've all been waiting for. Ladies and gentlemen, meet the lucky young man who's about to be become the monster with the mostest! Here he is, the Beast Boy!

Including the unconscious, half-naked Milk Man who Rick knocked out in freak house. The Milk Man domes to, looks around in a pan grabs the bars of the cage, and screams--

dialogues.speaker: STUEY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Rick! Over here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Stuey stands up on his seat and waves the cup, totally blocking the biker's view. He telepathically replies.

dialogues.speaker: STUEY, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Here I am, Rick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddammit, kid! Would you sit down!?

dialogues.text: The biker grabs the cup and dumps it over Stuey's head. T "good ointment" runs down all over Stuey's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes turn to Stuey, who falls down and disappears ont the floor screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly an EIGHT FOOT TALL MONSTER VERSION OF STUEY leap its feet and snarls down at the biker. The biker pulls a switchblade and jams it into Stuey monster's leg--the bla crumples on his armor-like hide. Stuey grins and SLAM! He drives the biker into the ground like a railroad spike. H leaps onto the stage and stalks Elijah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and the freaks in the cage cheer stuey Monster on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh, that kid looks pissed. EYE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: across the compound, and THWOPP! Into the Giant Head's ey sockets, where they spin around and come to a stop, cocke CRASH! The head's foundation crumbles and it keels over backwards.

dialogues.text: Elijah calls out to Toad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey Monster roars at Toad. Toad smiles weakly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toad catapults through it, follows the path of Eye and Ey across the compound and CRASH! Lands head first into the neck of the Giant Head. He gets up with the Giant Head st on his own head, making him look like one of those big he caricatures. He runs blindly across the yard and into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZZZAAAAPPP! BOINNGG! Eye and Eye zing out of the sockets, and Toad's tongue sticks ten feet out of the Giant Head's mouth. It's the biggest Tex Avery cartoon take ever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: looks worried. He scoops up some "evil ointment".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like it's time to roll out the big gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sayonara, kiddo. Any last words?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick considers it. He can't think of anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nahh. 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suit yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He raises the ointment over Rick. Rick has an idea for a last word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! Wait! (Elijah pauses. Rick

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nahh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah glops Rick. His skin starts to smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey Monster stalks Elijah onstage. Rick is smoking and shaking violently on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: turns to his EES cronies in the audience. He looks bored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a waste of twelve bucks. Let's get the machine and go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other executives nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: starts to transform. FWOOP! His ears spring out into huge monster ears, kinda like in Pinocchio. FWAAP! His mouth grows into a massive, Big Daddy Roth style monster mouth. FWEEP! His upper head does the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His body follows suit. He bursts' out of the straps and grows into a drooling TEN FOOT TALL RICK MONSTER. He snar at Stuey Monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! Rick! Could you sign this!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick Monster snarls and bashes Stuey Monster in the face. Stuey Monster jams the pen through the photo and snarls b 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even Julie is screaming "Fight! Fight," beside herself wi bloodthirsty glee. Ernie smacks her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd goes nuts as the monsters trade a series of cli pro-wrestling moves. Stuey bashes Rick. Rick bashes Stuey etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give him the skull cracker, ya big goon!

dialogues.text: No way! The skull cracker is an illegal move!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey grabs Rick's hair and marches him around the stage. The crowd is taking sides, screaming out advice, and foam at their mouths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get this over with. Hey Hertz, tell your goons to (he turns to Hertz and is

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: stands in front of the a group of EES HARDHATS who are us forklifts to move the Tasty Freekz Machine towards the ex He notices Elijah and taps his executive ASSISTANT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahem. At this point in time we at EES regret that we must leave this performance prematurely.

dialogues.text: What are you saying!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured I couldn't trust you corporate greaseballs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah turns to an alarm box on the wall which reads "BRE

dialogues.text: breaks the glass and pulls the lever inside. 94.

dialogues.text: A trapdoor on the stage opens and a large chemical tank r out of it. Elijah jumps into the seat of the gun turret nozzle atop the tank. He aims the nozzle at the EES group

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me proudly introduce the latest in our product line, Noxon 25--now available in a convenient pump!

dialogues.text: Bullshit! The Everything Except Shoes corporation releases no new products unless I give the order!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's time EES branched out a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alistair Cooke stands up in the audience--he's got a head bandage and a crutch from being trampled at the last show

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh! Head for the hills before he gets all of us!

dialogues.text: The crowd goes berserk and rushes the exits, trampling po Cooke like a roach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: flips Stuey onto the ground and starts stomping on him. Stuey is knocked out cold. Rick leaves him on the floor a stalks the freak cage murderously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! We're your friends!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. NOW I RIP FRIENDS TO PIECES!

dialogues.text: He rips some bars off the cage and is about to spear JulieErnie with a jagged steel bar when Stuey Monster gra his leg and trips him. Stuey summons all his remaining energy to wrestle Rick, delaying him, for the moment, fro slaughtering the freaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Elijah is watching as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: solidifies into... A GIANT SHOE made of living flesh. It' got eyeballs where the eyes should be, a tongue where the tongue should be, but it's helpless and immobile.

dialogues.text: Elijah looks at it with pride. He does his best Ed Sulliv

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now that's a really, really big shoe. Ha-ha-ha-ha! Hmmm, I think I'd like a pair of those!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He swivels the nozzle turret towards the cage full of fre and is about to glop them when Rick stands up above Stuey blocking Elijah's trajectory at the freak cage. Rick rais the jagged bar above Stuey, ready to drive it down throug his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Rick monster) Would you hurry up and waste the troll, please!? I got a lonely shoe over here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick Monster nods and drives the spear down when we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick's silhouette (which matches his ten foot monster incarnation) is immersed in the story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry to interrupt Rick, but you've been talking for almost ninety minutes, and we've just got to go to a commercial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be right back after this, folks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fine array of different kinds of cheese on a chopping block.

dialogues.speaker: TOUGH VOICED ANNCR
dialogues.text: You like cheese. You like being a man. That's why you like..
