dialogues.text: A BURLY HAND swipes all the cheese off the block and slam down an aluminum can labeled "MACHEESMO."

dialogues.speaker: TOUGH VOICED ANNCR
dialogues.text: Macheesemo. Real cheese for real men. Now in a handy aluminum dispenser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hand crushes the can and gooey yellow cheese squirts the top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. REGIS & KATHIE LEE SHOW SET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear a music bite from "Le Freak."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now back to the exciting conclusion of Ricky Coogan's incredible story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, let's see, the other freaks were lined up in Elijah's sights, and I was about to shove a pipe through Stuey's skull, when all of a sudden, I heard a voice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick stops the spear inches from Stuey's chest. Their eye meet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill him! Kill him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah's bloodthirsty goading fades away, and Cowboy's vo reverberates in Rick's head. 97.

dialogues.speaker: COWBOY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I reckon that troll could help you if you just let him into your heart... your heart... your heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voice keeps echoing. A tear wells up in Rick Monster' eye. He looks over at Cowboy, who is actually calling out him from the cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your heart... your heart... your heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick Monster loses his murderous glare. He breaks into a warm smile, throws the pipe away and helps Stuey Monster They hug. The rest of the Freaks cheer wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atta' boy Coog!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, ain't that somethin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Worm is gushing sentimentally. He tries to hide his tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tosh. (Sniff) Sentimental claptrap (Sniff) Shameless, maudlin--Baaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't hold it in anymore. He bawls like a baby. Meanwhile, Elijah is hopping mad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut the lovey-dovey bullshit, and start mutilating each other!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He aims at Rick Monster and presses the fire button. The Glop starts to flow, but before it can make it out of the tip, Rick grabs hold of the nozzle, and twists it around face Elijah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raarrrrrrgh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah manages to duck just in time. A stream of yellow Noxon 25 glop flies over his shoulder, and lands in the D TANK full of carbolic acid that sits off to one side of t tent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The acid and the Noxon mix together and bubble up menacin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah hops down out of the gunner's chair and squares of against Rick Monster. 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Stuey Monster has released the other freaks fr the cage. They watch the confrontation from a distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah rolls up his sleeves. Rick growls and advances slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I made you strong? HA! I've cranked my DNA up so high, you won't know what hit you. I'm a wrecking machine! Aaaaaaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes at Rick and delivers a flurry of punches to his section. They have absolutely no effect. Rick brings one heavy fist slamming down on Elijah's head, stopping him c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow! I think you crushed my spinal cord. I can't feel anything in my fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you'll feel this ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick rears back to kick him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Qait--if you kill me, you'll never find the antidote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freaks all perk up. Rick's skeptical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What antidote?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A time release serum--I baked it into a delicious batch of macaroons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A slow smile grows on the Freaks' faces, especially Rick'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you ask me, you skimped on the coconut!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THWAK! Rick boots Elijah between the legs, sending him flying through the air. He lands on the DUNK TANK SEAT ov the bubbling Noxon/Acid. Dazed, he looks at the bullseye target, and back at Rick. Summoning up his last ounce of bravado, Elijah makes a last stand. 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Coogan! Come oooon! You haven't got the guts to kill me! Go on! I dare ya'!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick ponders for a second. He looks over to Julie. Then..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yap! Yap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrappy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrappy the dog rushes in. He leaps up and presses the bullseye, dropping Elijah into the hideous mixture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elijah struggles in agony. His body bubbles and mutates i the thick toxic soup. He sinks lower and lower into the gunk, until he and his cries are buried for good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scrappy leaps into Rick's arms and licks his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Atta boy, Scrap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! The tent flaps fly open and a half dozen FBI AGENTS rush in with guns drawn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freeze, FBI!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another FBI GUY investigates the dunk tank, sees Elijah's floating on top of the bubbling ooze.

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER FBI GUY
dialogues.text: Looks like they took care of Skuggs, chief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chief nods. They put away their guns, and approach Ri and the rest of the jubilant freaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice work, Ricky. You'll get a medal from the Vice President for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. But how did you-- 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been following Skuggs for years. Scrappy just filled in some of the details.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank heavens you brought him to justice, Rick. God only knows how far his sick plans would've gone.

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER FBI GUY
dialogues.text: Hey chief, look at this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FBI guy has peeled the decal off the Pepsi machine, revealing that it's actually a Coke machine! The chief is sickened to the core.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is nothing sacred?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the agents are distracted by a terrible scream. They turn to the dunk tank and are shocked by what they s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my Lord!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! It can't be!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We SWISH PAN over to reveal a DRIPPING BLOB climbing out the dunk tank. The blob separates into two distinct entit with their backs to us. They turn around and...my God it's... it's....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or at least a damn fine mutant imitation of them. Call him/them ELIJUS and ELLY LEE. They both have glowing red demon eyes and speak in Elijah's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought you killed me, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you looking at?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two pieces of deadmeat! 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! The FBI guys open fire. We show only the horrified reactions of the freaks as they look on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick, Regis, and Kathie Lee are still in silhouette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's my story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was so exciting!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And long! My God! It makes War and Peace sound like a warm up act!

dialogues.speaker: CREW GUY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Okay! We got light!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fixed? Well, it's about time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights come on--no more silhouettes. Ricky looks perfectly normal, his old self. His weird silhouette was caused by a potted plant and some strange hanging mobile behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How 'bout it, folks. Let's hear it for Ricky Coogan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience applauds and hoots wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we bring out the other freaks now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience cheers as the rest of the Freaks walk out fr the wings, and stand off to the side waving to the audien They all look clean cut and happy. They wear T-shirts wit their former identities printed on them. "I was NOSEY," " was COWBOY," "I was the BEARDED LADY" etc. Except the Wor who's still a worm. His T-shirt says, "I'm Still THE WORM 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ridiculous... Just because a man doesn't like macaroons... Nonsense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a squirrel runs across stage, followed by Juan. pounces and catches the furry little bugger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha! Damn, it's about time!

dialogues.speaker: ALL THE EX-FREAKS
dialogues.text: (happy to see him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey guys! Jeez! You look great!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's just great. What a story. And what an ending! Elijah transformed by the goop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he really looked like--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly like you two, I swear. Same faces, same outfits, except they had these really big, hideous feet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks down at Regis and KATHIE LEE's feet--they're big hideous monster feet! Suddenly their eyes glow bright red It's Elijus and Elly Lee! They speak with Elijah's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Show's over, Ricky!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna drink your blood!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elly Lee pulls a machete and is about to force it down on Rick's throat when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANG! BANG! BANG! Elijus and Elly Lee's eyes go funny. They look at each other, spit up some blood, wave to the audience one last time, and collapse to the floor. Julie stands behind them, smoking gun in hand. She rushes to Ri They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick! It's finally over! 103.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... Yes it is.

dialogues.speaker: STUEY, (O.C.)
dialogues.text: Rick! Rick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Julie turn and see Stuey, still a ten foot tall monster, running towards them. He's carrying a garbage ba dripping blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! I found the real Regis and Kathie Lee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Julie look at the bag, mortified. Stuey chuckles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, this is just my lunch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Julie sigh with relief. Stuey pulls out a simila leaking bag and holds it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (matter of fact) This is Regis and Kathie Lee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick and Julie nod casually--"Oh."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awwww!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Elijus and Elly Lee pop up from behind the couch bloodied, but still fierce. They're about to stab Rick an Julie when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BANG! BANG! BANG! BANG! BANG! Five more shots ring out and they fall dead--again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie stands off to the side with a smoking gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, like that wasn't totally predictable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, now it really is over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sappy END OF THE MOVIE MUSIC wells up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God. You know, this adventure has taught me something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When man starts impinging on the subtle perfection of the earth's natural order, the only thing he'll create is havoc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, Coog. I learned somethin' too. That men and women truly are equals. That the human spirit transcends gender and physical appearance, and thus it is immune to the petty degradations men may devise. I believe it was Moliere

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie's had enough. She socks Ernie square on the jaw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, shut up. (She turns to Rick) Let's go fuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick gives her the thumbs up. They turn to the audience.

dialogues.speaker: RICK/JULIE/ERNIE/STUEY MONSTER
dialogues.text: Good night, everybody!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The audience cheers. The HIT SINGLE from the soundtrack album kicks in as we...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the credits roll, and everybody continues to smile and wave at the cheering audience, Elijus and Elly Lee attack again. Ernie hands the gun to Stuey, who shoots them dead Well, dead-ish. Seconds later, after some more waving, th attack again. This time Nosey and the Bearded Lady stab t to death, sort of. A little more waving, before Elijus an Elly Lee make another pathetic attempt. They can barely stand. Cowboy clubs one with a mic stand. Worm head-butts the other. A few seconds later, Elijus's bloodied hand gropes its way over the top of the studio couch. Stuey ha to prop him up while members of the audience are invited to punch him in the chops. Ernie stands off to the side, charging everyone five bucks per blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we fade, everyone's having a go flipping, throwing, kicking and impaling rag doll replicas of America's favor morning show hosts.
